title: BRIEF-Growthpoint Properties Updates On Partial Offer And Subscription In Capital & Regional

BRIEF-Growthpoint Properties Updates On Partial Offer And Subscription In Capital & Regional

Stock Markets 21 minutes ago (Oct 21, 2019 09:18)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Growthpoint Properties Updates On Partial Offer And Subscription In Capital & Regional Oct 21 (Reuters) - Growthpoint Properties : * GROWTHPOINT PROPS.LD CAPITAL & REGIONAL - UPDATE RE: PARTIAL OFFER AND SUBSCRIPTION * GROWTHPOINT - GOT UNDERTAKINGS TO ACCEPT PARTIAL OFFER AT OFFER PRICE FROM ABOUT 17.7 PERCENT OF ISSUED SHARE CAPITAL OF CAPITAL & REGIONAL AS AT OCT 18
